name: ListCloseReasons
description:
Get a list of close reasons for jobs or openings.

Use this tool to retrieve all the reasons for closing jobs or openings. Useful for understanding job status changes. Requires hiring process metadata read permissions.

parameters.description: Set to true to include archived close reasons in the response.
